item.title: Uses
item.description: Sometimes I get asked what ‘what make is that’, ‘where did you get that from’ or just what tools etc. I use day to day, and after reading the page of at Wes Bos’ site I thought I’d shamelessly copy the format :) Editor + Terminal Currently using VS Code, yes I have tried Sublime, Atom et al. but I keep finding myself heading back to VS Code. I love the speed of it, I love the extensions, but overall after 8+ years of using the grown up Visual Studio it feels very familiar.
